backend/main.mo: Implements access-controlled user profiles, invite-code generation, and RSVP submission with admin-restricted queries for RSVPs and invite codes.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence records linking feature changes to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all major frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and sets basic metadata and title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Chooses between admin dashboard and public invitation UI based on authentication and admin status, composing main site layout.
frontend/src/components/AdminRSVPList.ts: Admin dashboard component showing RSVP totals, unused codes, invite-code generation, and a simplified RSVP table.
frontend/src/components/InvitationDetail: Displays detailed wedding information including welcome text, date/time, venue, and event schedule.
frontend/src/components/InvitationHero.t: Hero section with background image, emblem, and couple’s names styled for the invitation landing view.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity, showing status and clearing queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/RSVPForm.tsx: RSVP submission form that auto-fills invite code, submits via mutation, and shows a success message.
frontend/src/components/SectionOrnaments: Simple decorative image component rendered at the top or bottom of a section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context including login, logout, identity loading, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for admin checks, RSVP submission, invite code retrieval, and code generation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom theme variables for light/dark modes and imported fonts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that mounts React with QueryClient and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH color system, extended animations, shadows, and includes typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s schema version, state metadata, and a list of implemented features for the wedding invitation site, including RSVP and admin features.
